string-array.name: sign_desc
string-array.item: March 21 - April 19\nActive, Demanding, Determined, Effective, Ambitious
April 20 - May 20\nSecurity, Subtle strength, Appreciation, Instruction, Patience
May 21 - June 20\nCommunication, Indecision, Inquisitive, Intelligent, Changeable
June 21 - July 22\nEmotion, Diplomatic, Intensity, Impulsive, Selective
July 23 - August 22\nRuling, Warmth, Generosity, Faithful, Initiative
August 23 - September 22\nAnalyzing, Practical, Reflective, Observation, Thoughtful
September 23 - October 22\nBalance, Justice, Truth, Beauty, Perfection
December 22 - January 19\nDetermination, Dominance, Perservering, Practical, Willful
January 20 - February 18\nKnowledge, Humanitarian, Serious, Insightful, Duplicitous
February 19 - March 20\nFluctuation, Depth, Imagination, Reactive, Indecisive
